text: Miroslav Milošević (Serbian Cyrillic: Mиpocлaв Mилoшeвић; born 29 August 1976 in Niš) is a former Serbian footballer who played as a defender. ==Honours== ;Cherno More * Bulgarian Cup: runner-up 2006 ==External sources== * Profile at Ogol. title: Miroslav Milošević (footballer, born 1976)
